about_the_game: In the Alvara demo, you have access to the start of the game: the village of Bazzya and the surrounding Region. You will be able to complete all the quests of these first two levels but will then be blocked from exploring the world of Alvara.
detailed_description: In the Alvara demo, you have access to the start of the game: the village of Bazzya and the surrounding Region. You will be able to complete all the quests of these first two levels but will then be blocked from exploring the world of Alvara.
name: Alvara Demo
short_description: Alvara: Forge your destiny! Every choice shapes the adventure in this turn-based narrative RPG. Forge strong relationships, influence the story and recruit allies whose power depends on their affections. Craft, potion, explore, dominate. Alvara: Choices and alliances chart your course!
supported_languages:
English, French*, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
